description:
~~ The cutest, funniest and most playful piano in the App Store ~~ 
~~ 11 fabulous musical note types for you to enjoy! ~~
~~ Adorable Animations, HD illustrations and sound ~~

Kids Animal Piano is the sweetest piano app for toddlers in the App Store. Let your little one develop their love of music with 9 adorable animals each with their own animal sounding notes. kids Animal Piano has three classic songs that play and while the keys on the piano are pressed so as an added bonus your children can learn how to play these songs. With a cool drum and a classic piano settings Kids Animal Piano is designed to help children enjoy and appreciate different musical instrument. For hours of fun this app is the perfect way to spend musical quality time with your child.

What’s inside:
> 9 adorable animal music settings - cat, dog, chicken, cow, crow, owl, elephant, goat, and duck.
> Learn to play 3 classic songs - “Old Macdonald Had a Farm”, “Twinkle Twinkle” and “Are You Sleeping”
> Cool drums setting
> Classic piano setting
> HD quality illustrations and sounds

Note: 4 musical settings (Piano, Cat, Dog and Chicken) are completely free and supported by Ads. All 11 musical settings are available with an easy to use in-app purchase inside the application. Purchasing full version also removes all Ads.

Sound doesn't work?
Try Increasing the volume and check that your device is not set to “Mute”. The Mute button is located next to the volume buttons on the side of the device.

Still no sound?
On the iPad it's possible that your side switch is set to lock screen rotation. In this case you can control sound volume by:
Double tap the home button
Swipe the lower bar from left to right
Tap the speaker icon to the far left
It should show “Mute Off” below the play button
You can set the side switch functionality at “Settings > General > Use side switch to”

By downloading this application you agree to the Terms of Use of Kid Baby Toddler LTD. which are available to your review on http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/
